pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Interactive Chart with the JavaScript 'Billboard' Library // Provides an 'htmlwidgets' interface to 'billboard.js', a re- usable easy interface JavaScript chart library, based on D3 v4+. Chart types include line charts, scatterplots, bar charts, pie/donut charts and gauge charts. All charts are interactive, and a proxy method is implemented to smoothly update a chart without rendering it again in 'shiny' apps.
